info.description: This is a spec for Tailoring REST API
info.title: Swagger spec for Tailoring REST API

get.summary: Returns Manifest Details by Id, could be duplicate

post.summary: Returns the list of manifests by request
Change Status for Manifest with force

get.summary: Returns the status of garment by its ID

post.summary: Generate Order NCA, update garments and change status

get.summary: Returns Virtual Racks filtered by date
